name: Blusxea
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Island Creole loanwords
seafood- and salt-forward cuisine; communal tide-feasts
strong seamanship superstitions and small-scale ritual observances
imports shape material culture and ritual practices
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is banned; navigational auguries cannot replace charts
notes: population unknown; functions as a small regional port
limited heavy industry due to tech and reagent constraints
